text: Greetings, bestie! Thine blind date hath arrived!
So, how are you doing this fine day?
And I, in turn, am glad to be appreciated!
Hah... well, er... m-my thanks! I quite like your... ummâ€¦
I appreciate the attempt, but I must admit I found that somewhat offensive.

Well, regardless, there's no point in going to restaurant 
without eating. Have you any insights on which entrees don't miss?

Oh ho, a homestead of exceeding taste! 'Tis always hype to meet 
a fellow cabbage soup enjoyer.

Your company today has been lovely. Should it please you, I would 
love to meet again. I shall see you later, Bestie!

I must admit that is not my usual go-to, but you have piqued 
my curiosity. And refusing to undertake any new endeavors is no 
way to go through life.

I have found this date sufficiently enjoyable. 
Perhaps we shall meet again someday.

What in the world dost thou think thine is cooking!? 
That much cholesterol could quell a revolution!

Thank you for the meal. If there's nothing else, 
I shall be on my way. Have a good one.
